The Indian Army is the land-based branch and the largest component of the Indian Armed Forces. The President of India is the Supreme Commander of the Indian Army, and its professional head is the Chief of Army Staff, who is a four-star general.

patterns: Who is the Chief of Army Staff?
Who is the current chief of army?
responses: The current general is Gen. Manoj Pande.
The current COAS is Gen Manoj Pande.
General Manoj Pande
The current Chief of Army Staff is Gen. Manoj Pande.

patterns: Who is the Chief of Defence Staff?
Who is the current chief of defense staff?
Who is the current chief of defence forces?
responses: The current CDS is Gen Anil Chouhan
The current Chief of Defence Staff is Gen Anil Chouhan
General Anil Chouhan
There are 7 Army Commands in India viz. Northern Command, Southern Command, Eastern Command, Western Command, Central Command, South Western Command & Training Command
The Northern Command is located at Udhampur
It is an army command at Udhampur.
The Southern Command is located at Pune
It is an army command at Pune.
The Western Command is located at Chandi Mandir
It is an army command at Chandi Mandir.
The Eastern Command is located at Kolkata
It is an army command at Kolkata.

patterns: Tell me about south western command
responses: The South Western Command is located at Jaipur
It is an army command at Jaipur.
The Training Command is located at Shimla
It is an army training command at Shimla.
